value.title: OpenAI launches an API to commercialize its research
value.excerpt: OpenAI launched an API to commercialize -- and prevent the abuse of -- the AI and machine leraning models it's actively developing.

value.title: Amazon Suspends Police Use of Its Facial-Recognition Technology
value.excerpt: The company said it is halting law-enforcement use of its facial-recognition technology for a year, as Congress takes steps to regulate such tools amid widespread criticism about racial and gender bias.

images.title: Amazon Suspends Police Use of Its Facial-Recognition Technology

value.title: Speech recognition startup Uniphore leverages AI to ready for post-coronavirus world
value.excerpt: The need for automation is soaring amid the coronavirus crisis as BPO calls swell. Conversational AI startup Uniphore is tapping technology to change the way enterprises engage with consumers and build loyalty in the post-COVID-19 world.

images.title: Speech recognition startup Uniphore leverages AI to ready for post-coronavirus world

value.title: Daily Crunch: IBM is getting out of facial recognition
value.excerpt: IBM’s CEO takes a stand on mass surveillance, Apple may soon make a big chip announcement and Google Maps gets new features to help users navigate transit safely. Here’s your Daily Crunch for . 1. IBM ends all facial recognition business as CEO calls out bias and inequality

value.title: TCL’s latest TVs in India can be controlled just by voice
value.excerpt: The TCL P715 consists of several 4K smart TVs that start at Rs 39,990 and go all the way up to Rs 99,990. The company has not revealed the complete details of the series yet nor has it mentioned the number of TVs in the series.

images.title: TCL’s latest TVs in India can be controlled just by voice

value.title: Senator fears Clearview AI facial recognition could be used on protesters
value.excerpt: Sen. Edward Markey asks if the company considers a history of discriminatory policing before selling the tech to certain law enforcement agencies.

images.title: Senator fears Clearview AI facial recognition could be used on protesters

value.title: Facebook’s TransCoder AI converts code from one programming language into another
value.excerpt: Facebook's TransCoder AI model can translate among programming languages like Java, C++, and Python with high computational accuracy.

images.title: Facebook’s TransCoder AI converts code from one programming language into another

value.title: Google’s Performer AI architecture could advance protein analysis and cut compute costs
value.excerpt: In a newly published preprint paper, researchers propose Performer, an AI architecture they say could advance protein analysis while cutting compute costs.

images.title: Google’s Performer AI architecture could advance protein analysis and cut compute costs

value.title: The best-performing analysts are betting on these 5 stocks right now
value.excerpt: As coronavirus restrictions ease and business begins to improve, it could make sense to follow the stock picks of analysts with a proven track record of success. Here we used TipRanks analyst ranking service to pinpoint Wall Street’s best-performing analysts.

images.title: The best-performing analysts are betting on these 5 stocks right now

value.title: Technology Can Help Organizations Reduce Racism, But Will It?
value.excerpt: Unlike humans, computers don’t care about your race, gender, or religion: they don’t have a fragile self-esteem they need to boost by bringing other people down, and they don’t need to bond with other computers by stigmatizing certain groups of humans (or computers).

images.title: Technology Can Help Organizations Reduce Racism, But Will It?

value.excerpt: The new version expands capabilities of its discrimination and bias protection, bringing the tool to R users and scikit-learn.

value.excerpt: Google Translate is quantifiably improving across 108 languages thanks in part to new AI and machine learning techniques.

value.title: Cerence provides Ford AI and voice recognition
value.excerpt: Cerence says Ford has selected the company's Drive products to bring advanced, conversational AI and voice recognition to the automaker's Sync 4 communications and entertainment system.

value.title: iOS 14 Safari to get built-in translation, better Apple Pencil support
value.excerpt: The Internet has made the world a smaller place but, unless you’ve taken time to learn multiple languages, chances are you’ll come across pages that are incomprehensible to you.

value.title: BBC launches Beeb voice assistant in partnership with Microsoft
value.excerpt: The BBC has launched an early beta version of its previously announced Beeb voice assistant in partnership with Microsoft.

images.title: BBC launches Beeb voice assistant in partnership with Microsoft

value.title: This voice recorder looks like a cassette tape and uses AI to transcribe 10 languages
value.excerpt: It’s said to support 10 languages, including English, Japanese, Korean and Spanish. The company also says it supports 12 Chinese dialects, including Cantonese. It also looks nothing like a pen, though older people tell me it actually resembles something called a cassette tape.

images.title: This voice recorder looks like a cassette tape and uses AI to transcribe 10 languages

value.title: Remember S Voice? Samsung is finally shutting it down
value.excerpt: Samsung introduced its Bixby voice assistant back in 2017, and it’s served as the first-party assistant on Samsung gadgets ever since. But this wasn’t Samsung’s first voice assistant, as that would be S Voice.

images.title: Remember S Voice? Samsung is finally shutting it down

value.title: 'It's fundamental': Graphcore CEO believes new kinds of AI will prove the worth of a new kind of computer
value.excerpt: Graphcore, the four-year-old startup based in Bristol, England, has a chip that takes the kinds of math that a neural network processes and splits them across 1,216 tiny computers, each of which does its work in parallel with its brethren.

images.title: 'It's fundamental': Graphcore CEO believes new kinds of AI will prove the worth of a new kind of computer

value.title: Chicago Police Drop Clearview Facial Recognition Technology
value.excerpt: Chicago police is no longer using facial recognition software developed by a firm that was sued by a civil rights organization this week over privacy concerns.

value.title: New AI technique speeds up language models on edge devices
value.excerpt: Researchers at the MIT Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence Laboratory (CSAIL) and MIT-IBM Watson AI Lab recently proposed Hardware-Aware Transformers (HAT), an AI model training technique that incorporates Google’s Transformer architecture.

images.title: New AI technique speeds up language models on edge devices

value.title: Sayyy whatttt?: Researchers analyze strange human tweets to build better AI
value.excerpt: Twitter is a weird place with a language all its own. A new study focuses on using the tweets, chock-full of misspellings and slang, to improve artificial intelligence.

images.title: Sayyy whatttt?: Researchers analyze strange human tweets to build better AI

value.title: OpenAI debuts gigantic GPT-3 language model with 175 billion parameters
value.excerpt: OpenAI's GPT-3 language model can generate convincing news articles and achieve state-of-the-art results on a range of NLP tasks with few-shot learning.

images.title: OpenAI debuts gigantic GPT-3 language model with 175 billion parameters

value.title: OpenAI’s new text generator writes sad poems and corrects lousy grammar

value.title: The Temptations Of Artificial Intelligence Technology And The Price Of Admission
value.excerpt: The internal workings of ML algorithms are something of a black box, which makes vigilant monitoring of their predictions extremely important.

value.title: Chinese tech leader says AI can play a role in Beijing’s goal of eliminating poverty

value.title: ACLU sues facial recognition startup Clearview AI for privacy and safety violations
value.excerpt: The ACLU claims Clearview AI "will end privacy as we know it if it isn't stopped" and calls the startup a threat to safety.

value.title: Facebook AI Research applies Transformer architecture to streamline object detection models
value.excerpt: Facebook AI researchers claim they created the first object detection model with the Transformer neural network architecture typically used for NLP.
